Name: TVR
Instructions: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass. Lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Very much 'driven' by the flavour of Red Bull. Use an anejo tequila to balance the initial sweetness on the palate.
History: A 90s drink named after its ingredients (tequila, vodka, Red Bull), and which is also the name of a British sports car.
Nutrition: One serving of TVR contains 132 calories
